descriptions.overview: Illuminate your outdoor space with this 12 In. brown wicker outdoor lantern with a wax LED candle. Place it on your patio table, barhop or next to a group of chairs and use the included remote to choose from 12 different color options for the LED candle. The remote also allows you to set a 4 or 8 hour timer so you don't need to worry about forgetting to turn it off when you turn in for the night.
list: LED candle has 12 color changing options
Included remote controls candle power, color and timer
Can be used outdoors or indoors
LED candle is made of wax, keep out of direct, hot sun to prevent melting

reviews.title: "Frigile, yet very eye appealing"
reviews.text: I put this over my fireplace on the mantel. The wicker is very fragile - either I broke one of the sticks on the first day or it was already like that when I bought it, and I just didn't notice. Just be careful with it.  However, it looks NICE!! The remote will change the candle to any primary color, which is very cool.  This is quite the conversation piece and would look good in almost any room.    I'd buy it again.
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Wicker Lantern"
reviews.text: Will built but when the candle was put in the sun for more then two hours it melted but stills work fine.
reviews.author: Mac

reviews.text: This item is a very nice piece of patio decor. It's lightning is unbelievably bright and includes manydifferent shades of color. So happy to have madethis purchase at Lowe's.
reviews.author: RJ

reviews.title: "Love it"
reviews.text: Looks great on the patio set and love the fact that you can make the candle different colors.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "Beautiful!"
reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! I love the remote and being able to change the colors!
reviews.author: ShortnSassy

reviews.title: "Wicker lantern w/LED"
reviews.text: Great lantern for outside or inside. Love the light.
reviews.author: Sarah

reviews.title: "Works very well"
reviews.text: The quality appears to be good.  I like the ability to pick different colors and the remote works well
reviews.author: Mick3411

reviews.title: "Wicker lantern"
reviews.text: Works well for inside or outside. Like the remote control.
